p: We used only MaxEnt as an SDM method here. Different SDM methods can lead to the same performance in predicting distributions (in terms of the indicators AUC and TSS [ 50]), including for climate change scenarios [ 27], but their predictions can vary [ 65– 67]. Ensemble methods that average across the results of different methodologies have been advocated to reduce model uncertainty [ 68– 71], but sometimes this is not an automatic outcome and care is needed [ 72, 73] to avoid inappropriate conclusions [ 74].
